publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4501 Richard Baker: Vandalism - Everyone Pays Campaign—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the Vandalism - Everyone Pays campaign by Grampian Police; believes that vandalism is an unacceptable form of anti-social behaviour which affects the quality of life of many communities; notes that the campaign will involve local people and celebrities talking about their experiences of vandalism, in an effort to make Aberdeen a cleaner and more pleasant place to live and work; believes that joint working between the police and local communities can and will reduce levels of vandalism; congratulates Aberdeen City Council, the Evening Express and Northsound Radio who are all partners in the campaign, and urges anyone affected by vandalism in Aberdeen to come forward with any information that may help.
